title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 366.1 - Department employees designated as peace officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 366.1 - Department employees designated as peace officers

State Regulations

Employees working in the Department of Agriculture and

Markets under the title of Confidential Investigator are hereby designated as
peace officers pursuant to Criminal Procedures Law, section
2.10
(6). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
366.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
